description:
Hibiki wants to track him down the new hero Air Beat and get him to join their team. It turns out that Air Beat`s true identity is Kaneyama Charlie Tsubasa, a fourth grader who runs his own company! Although Tsubasa initially refuses Hibiki`s offer, when Mink and Tank steal his precious rocking horse, he might just have to rethink it...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dancing President Is in Elementary School!
